ABOUT.TITLE: About me
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: I am a full stack developer passionate about creating modern and efficient web applications.
ABOUT.BIO: Data Analytics Engineer with over two years of experience in the retail sector. I have contributed to the design and development of a self-service data platform, dashboards, and data pipelines using Looker, Tableau, DBT, and BigQuery. My approach is based on attentive listening and a deep understanding of business needs, enabling me to design effective and relevant data solutions.

AUCHAN.DESCRIPTION: Data Analytics Engineer who participated in modernizing the modern data stack at Auchan
ACHIEVEMENTS: Developed and deployed Auchan France's first Looker platform with over 2,000 users (BigQuery, Looker, DBT, Git).
Modeled, designed, and maintained the semantic layer (DBT, Airflow, and LookML).
Implemented data transformation pipelines (DBT and SQL/BigQuery).
Created and maintained dashboards (Tableau Software, Looker).
Maintained and updated data flows to ensure dashboard reliability (Airflow).
Facilitated the Tableau community and an internal Looker Auchan community through training sessions, dashboard optimization, and technology monitoring.

WAVESTONE.DESCRIPTION: Intern consultant in the IT & Data department
ACHIEVEMENTS: Conducted a benchmark for API Manager solutions: scoping, benchmarking, and recommendations.
Developed a Proof of Concept (PoC) using FastAPI and Python on WSO2.
Conducted competitive intelligence on data strategy.
